languages.text: {n}Массивный техножрец облачен в необычную броню, явно изготовленную для битв и побывавшую во многих схватках. Вы не можете опознать ее тип, но в этом нет ничего удивительного — Механикус имеют сотни специфических моделей для любого предмета.{/n}

{n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Массивный техножрец облачен в необычную броню, явно изготовленную для битв и побывавшую во многих схватках. Вы не можете опознать ее тип, но в этом нет ничего удивительного — Механикус имеют сотни специфических моделей для любого предмета.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour, which was clearly made for battle and has seen many. You can't identify its type, which is no surprise. The Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised makes for any item.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.locale_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour, which was clearly made for battle and has seen many. You can't identify its type, which is no surprise. The Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised makes for any item.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.locale_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.locale_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}巨大な技術司祭は普段とは異なるアーマーを身につけている。それは明らかに戦闘のために作られ、また多くの戦いを目撃してきたものであった。そのタイプを特定することはできなかったが、驚くことはなかった。帝国技術局は、あらゆるものに何百という特別モデルを持っているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な技術司祭は普段とは異なるアーマーを身につけている。それは明らかに戦闘のために作られ、また多くの戦いを目撃してきたものであった。そのタイプを特定することはできなかったが、驚くことはなかった。帝国技術局は、あらゆるものに何百という特別モデルを持っているのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}身材壮硕的技术神甫穿着不同寻常的护甲，显然是专门为了战斗生产的护甲，而且经历过无数场战斗。你之前并没见过这样的护甲，不过这也不足为奇，毕竟机械修会制造几百种不同型号的护甲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身材壮硕的技术祭司穿着不同寻常的护甲，显然是专门为了生产的护甲，而且经历过无数场战斗。你之前并没见过这样的护甲，不过这也不足为奇，毕竟机械修会掌握着几百种制造护甲的方法。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Der gewaltige Techpriester trägt eine ungewöhnliche Rüstung, die eindeutig für den Kampf gemacht wurde und schon oft im Einsatz war. Das Modell kannst du nicht identifizieren, aber das ist kein Wunder. Der Mechanicus hat Hunderte von spezialisierten Ausfertigungen für jedes Objekt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gewaltige Techpriester trägt eine ungewöhnliche Rüstung, die eindeutig für den Kampf gemacht wurde und schon oft im Einsatz war. Das Modell kannst du nicht identifizieren, aber das ist kein Wunder. Der Mechanicus hat Hunderte von spezialisierten Ausfertigungen für jedes Objekt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}L'énorme technoprêtre est vêtu d'une armure hors du commun. Visiblement conçue pour le combat, elle semble avoir beaucoup servi. Vous ne parvenez pas à en identifier la classe, et ce n'est guère surprenant. Pour chaque équipement, l'Adeptus Mechanicus dispose de centaines de modèles différents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'énorme technoprêtre est vêtu d'une armure hors du commun. Visiblement conçue pour le combat, elle semble avoir beaucoup servi. Vous ne parvenez pas à en identifier la classe, et ce n'est guère surprenant. Pour chaque équipement, le Mechanicus dispose de centaines de modèles différents.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}El inmenso tecnosacerdote está ataviado con una armadura de aspecto inusual, claramente diseñada para el combate (y ha visto muchos). No logras identificar el tipo, lo cual no es de extrañar; el Adeptus Mechanicus posee cientos de modelos especializados para cada objeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El inmenso tecnosacerdote está ataviado con una armadura de aspecto inusual, claramente diseñada para el combate (y ha visto muchos). No logras identificar el tipo, lo cual no es de extrañar; el Mechanicus posee cientos de modelos especializados para cada objeto.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Haşmetli Tekno Rahip, muharebe için yapıldığı ve bol bol da muharebe gördüğü belli olan, sıra dışı bir zırh kuşanmış durumda. Türünü tanımlayamamana şaşmamak gerek. Zira Adeptus Mechanicus'un her tür iş için özel olarak geliştirdiği, yüzlerce farklı model mevcuttur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest is clad in unusual armour clearly made for battle and which has seen many of them. You cannot identify its type, which is no surprise. The Adeptus Mechanicus have hundreds of specialised models for any item.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haşmetli Tekno Rahip, muharebe için yapıldığı ve bol bol da muharebe gördüğü belli olan, sıra dışı bir zırh kuşanmış durumda. Türünü tanımlayamıyorsun ki bu hiç şaşırtıcı değil. Adeptus Mechanicus'un her tür iş için özel geliştirdiği yüzlerce model vardır.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus
